item.title: Da helll is dis
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

public boolean canOpenChest(Client c) { for (int j = 0; j < PrizeChest.length; j++) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() < PrizeChest[j][1] && !Item.itemStackable[PrizeChest[j][0]]) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough inventory space to do this."); return false; } } if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.boxDelay < 2000) return false; return true; }

find

and put
